name: A phone is all you need
name_original: A phone is all you need
description:
Imagine being a citizen of a country. That isn't very hard. However, imagine that in said country there is no one that shares your views on the world. Imagine you had the power to change it.

Imagine your phone was your only tool, and that all you did to improve your situation had to be handled through it. Imagine checking your Parliament's composition, how your co-citizens thought of you, all through apps.

Imagine going to protests. Imagine giving interviews. Imagine chatting with fellow citizens and improving their views on your views.

Now stop imagining. Because a phone is all you need.
